segments.text: I'd like to discuss your dear papa.
Nothing he's done. It's what he wants to do.
How would you both feel about him getting married?
Why can't they just carry on as they are?
Because Charles will be king one day.
The last time we had an unmarried king on the throne, it did not end well.
Actually, both of us prefer to think of him with Mummy.
And anything other than that feels...
But, I suppose, this is the reality.
And she does seem to make him happy.
And having him happy and settled is good for us.
Well, as you say, he is going to be king, isn't he, one day?
Yes. Plus, then he might finally shut up about it all.
Thank you. I didn't want to give my blessing until you'd given yours.
